title: Although I Was Summoned as a Scapegoat, I’m Happy ~ Sequel ~ - Novel Updates
tags: Demon Lord   Demons   Female Protagonist   Love at First Sight   Magic   Oneshot   Saints
author: 高遠ユウ
description:
A magic circle wrapped a beautiful girl from my class. However, that woman made me a scapegoat and I got summoned as a Saint.
Saint-sama? Subjugate the Demon King? Stop kidding me!
Sequel.>
